channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevteam -- Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevteam -- Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders

item.title: CVE-2024-2650|2024-04-09T18:58:56.390Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the alignment parameter in the Woo Product Carousel widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.10 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5188|2024-06-06T11:03:03.438Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'get_manual_calendar_events' function in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.22 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
